attributes.action: INSOMNIA , ME, CFS , PVFS research needed
attributes.additional_details:
I call upon the Department of Health to allocate more resourses to look at Insomnia ME CFS PVFS.FMS
At least 25% of adults suffer from insomnia at some stage in their lives, 17 million people world wide have CFS/ME, PVFS is also worldwide, FMS strikes at least 2% of the population in the USA alone it is estimated 11 million people have this illness.

It is not just the people who have these dibilitating ilenesses thier families suffer too, at present the UK GP's are prescribing sleeping pills rather than looking for a cure, sleeping pills have been linked to early deaths, once again I ask the Department of health to look into all these ilnesses and provide adaquate funding for research and cures ...Thank you
